availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas E. Gooch (Madison County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Chiswell D. Gooch and Eliza Gooch. Married to Mildred E. Williams Gooch in Madison County, Kentucky, in December 1860. Father of Edna Gooch and Robert Gooch. Attended school in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 1, p. 213B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Division 1, p. 281.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Division 1, p. 447A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Union, p. 288A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film 000183317, p. 373.
"Thomas E. Gooch (1836-1918)," Find A Grave, Memorial 56809397, accessed January 20, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/56809397.
